mapper.sql: id, title, category, resource, linkType, videoUrl, H5Url, coverImageUrl, postTime, type, illType, delFlag
mapper.delete: update t_article set delFlag=1 where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into t_article (id, title, category, resource, linkType, videoUrl, H5Url, coverImageUrl, postTime, type, illType, delFlag, content) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{category,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{resource,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{linkType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{videoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{h5Url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverImageUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{postTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{illType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})

title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
